sentences.en: The US President Richard Nixon paid an official visit to China, during which Sino-US joint communique was issued in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 美国总统理查德·尼克松对中国进行正式访问，其间《中美联合公报》在上海发表。

sentences.en: December 16, 1978: China and the US issued a joint communique which called for the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries on January 1, 1979.
sentences.cn: 1978年12月16日，中美发表联合公报，宣布两国于1979年1月1日建立外交关系。
